tool_description: Compares multiple routes based on various criteria such as time, distance, cost, and user preferences to recommend the best option.

route_ids.description: List of route identifiers to compare

user_preferences.description: User preferences to consider in ranking

error_messages: Insufficient routes: Need at least 2 routes for comparison.
Invalid route IDs: One or more route identifiers not found.
Invalid criteria: Use only [time, distance, cost, comfort, safety, scenic].
Invalid preferences: Use only [avoid_tolls, avoid_highways, prefer_scenic, minimize_turns].
Comparison failed: Unable to retrieve route data for comparison.
usage: Provide route_ids array with at least 2 route identifiers. Optionally specify comparison_criteria to focus on specific metrics and user_preferences for personalized rankings.

route_rankings.description: Route IDs ordered from best to worst

detailed_metrics.description: Detailed comparison metrics for each route
